text: "Touch by Touch" is a song by Austrian Euro disco band Joy, released in November 1, 1985 as the second single from their debut album, Hello. The song was a huge success in their homeland, where it reached number one. In Germany, the song reached the top 20, peaking at No. 18 in 1986. It also became a hit in East Asia and the Philippines, and remains as the band's signature song. the soundtrack appears in the South Korean dub of Nutri Ventures and Kid Cosmic, and others. Category:1985 songs Category:Disco songs
title: Touch by Touch
